description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_qualityinforecord_srv` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Quality Info Record API v1.2.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_QUALITYINFORECORD_SRV/overview). This service allows to create, read, update, and delete data related to quality info records and first article inspection.
